channel.title: ! Need Help Please!
channel.description:
Y00...Well i sorta need help...All day i'v been trying to make a private server..I'v down loaded the following:
MEGAUPLOAD And some kind of wisard maker in v.1 and v.2 and v.3 i saw on forums... I just want to make a server that i can make shops and make me admin and make people admin and i can tell people about it :|
Please help me make 1 and talk back plz!
Email me at : Liamsford@yahoo.com I also have yahoo messenger and my user is : Liamsford
Please help me

item.title: ! Need Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

liamsford:

Wut u think Vince? :D[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 09:03:55 PM[/size][hr]WOULD ANY 1 BE NICE ANY TELL ME HOW TO DOWNLOAD SOMETHING OFF OF [sup]MEGAUPLOAD PLEASE!!! :mad:[/sup]

MegaUpload -> On the top Right hand Corner, Click “Download” Wait 45 Seconds or So, Type in the 3 Digits/Letters. Download Prompt will pop up, then you may start downloading.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic

item.title: ! Need Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

Well you need to know how to Port Forward from your Router, learn it at www.portforward.com Different router have different routines. And sure, I’ll see what I can do to help you if you need help afterwards.

G’ Night.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic

item.title: ! Need Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

Well, I can’t really say which is good or not, I use TestScape to start me off, but different users, Different taste don’t ya say? Just have fun Playing with different Sources, You’ll pick up one that you Favor more, which will then suit you

And… You’re Welcome.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic
